ygData.subject: Re: new here...used to play eq
ygData.msgSnippet: When I said the account is stoped. I meant that the person has stoped paying for the account. If you ll re-read the post, he states that it s an
ygData.messageBody:
"When I said the account is stoped. I meant that
the person has stoped paying for the account.
"<br><br>If you'll re-read the post, he states that it's an
inactive account without specifying what's
inactive.<br><br>However, he adds relevant info that makes me think that he
didn't pay during the period he mentions. He states that
Sony/Verant reserves the right to delete non-paying accounts
after 3 months. <br><br>I'm guessing that he means that
they often don't care or it's too much work to delete
when they don't have to and they leave chars on the
servers even up to a year or more.<br><br>Sounds
consistant with others that I've talked to. Some get deleted
in a few months, but most tell me that 6 months or
more later... they've still got
characters.<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic (now even more late for
school.. .lol)
